description.diamond-pearl:
The user lays a trap
of levitating stones
around the foe. The
trap hurts foes that
switch into battle.
description.platinum:
The user lays a trap
of levitating stones
around the foe. The
trap hurts foes that
switch into battle.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user lays a trap
of levitating stones
around the foe. The
trap hurts foes that
switch into battle.
description.black-white:
The user lays a trap of levitating stones
around the opponent’s team. The trap
hurts opponents that switch into battle.

The user lays a trap of levitating stones
around the opponent’s team. The trap
hurts opponents that switch into battle.
description.x-y:
The user lays a trap of levitating stones
around the opposing team. The trap hurts
opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

effect.full:
Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP.  This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon's susceptibility to rock moves.

rapid spin removes this effect from its user's side of the field.
effect.shortEffect: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.
